name: Crooked Ice Cream
description:
Play as an Ice Cream Salesman trying to sell as many ice creams as possible during the heatwave. To keep the heatwave going you have invested in wind turbines to blow the clouds away, sell as many ice creams as you can before nature pushes back!

Developers:
Callum Pearce: https://www.pearceprogramming.co.uk/
Richard Burton: http://www.richardsburton.co.uk/
